name: community-kitchen-forms
description: Google Apps Script for Community Kitchen Forms

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:web:react && npm run build:server && npm run check:bundle
scripts.build:web:react: node scripts/embed-html-templates.js && esbuild src/web/react/main.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/webform-react.js --format=iife --target=es2019 --jsx=automatic --minify --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --loader:.css=text && node scripts/build-react-entrypoints.js && node scripts/embed-react-bundle.js
